DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that platelet-derived repairing factors are effective and safe in the treatment of muscular lesion grade 2 or 3, a Phase II, open-label, single arm, single centre has been designed. Sample size will be 25.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet-derived Factors for Treatment of Muscular Lesions
DOC.criteria: age > 18 years old if woman, no pregnancy ongoing muscular lesion grade 2 or 3 in a lower limb muscular group no hematological conditions no anticoagulation in the two preceding weeks
